name: montresor
notes:
a b o u t d e s i g n

knitting small pieces like this pouch always brings me back to nostalgia of my childhood
with my grandma marcelle, who gave me her leftover yarns to learn. for me these leftover
skeins were always treasures.
montresor pouch is a fun and very cute little project. it is a very quick knit for your
holidays and to start your christmas gifts.

y a r n
knitting for olive
one strand of merino held with one strand of soft
silk mohair (cream col.)
1 ball of each

n o t i o n s
1 unique stitch marker
3 unique removable stitch markers
1 tapestry needle

n e e d l e s
4mm circular needles 60cm and
4mm dpn to achieve straps

g a u g e
22 sts x 32 sts in pattern

------

thank you for your understanding.

**les patrons gratuits sont à usage personnel uniquement.
aucune aide ne sera apportée à leurs réalisations,** 

merci de votre compréhension.
